resources.string: An accelerometer version of the Android Lunar Lander demo.

Lunar Tilt Lander based on the Android Lunar Lander demo, with accelerometer support added by Ian Cameron Smith (headstay). This is mainly a simple accelerometer demo; if you find if fun to play, all the better.

Land the lander on the green landing pad. Touch the screen to fire the engines; you have to be going slow and level when you land, but watch your fuel (green bar at top left). Tilt the device left and right to steer.

For more information and source code see the project home page: http://code.google.com/p/tiltlander/
